General.Name: Sintercom India Limited
General.Description: Sintercom India Limited manufactures and sells sintered metal components and auto components for various automobile applications primarily in India. The company offers engine components, including drive gears, chain sprockets, belt pulleys, and engine shaft bearing caps; transmissions components, such as synchroniser hubs, dog rings, and drive-train gears for 2-wheeler and 4-wheeler automobile platforms; and components of exhaust systems, sensor bosses, and sensor parts for various vehicle platforms. It also provides components in automotive auxiliary applications, helical pulleys for electric power steering applications, and high precision components for actuators; soft magnetic composite components and assemblies for applications in electric motors; and powder metal components for sensors. In addition, the company offers crankshaft bearing journals, transmission gears, and synchro hubs, as well as ABS rings and sensor hego bosses and flanges. It primarily serves original equipment manufacturers. Sintercom India Limited was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Pune, India.
